Html:
Hi,

I am planning to create a module to implement client/server communication with PRISM. In short, distributed application (parts of server, parts on clients) should behave like one big app. Its only a side project in a very early stage, but perhaps somebody did something similar already. If yes, a short note would be nice, no need to reinvent the wheel.

The whole "approach" is described here (rough draft, thinking about creating a codeplex project)..

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1591829/prism-and-wcf-do-they-play-nice

Chris

PS: If there are plans to do something similar by the "pros", let me know. Would be a shame if I work on it for a few weeks, and then you release a new drop including some WCF features :-)
